greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A hierarchical sequence (W2{3}c - see A059126).
formula: a((2*n+1)*2^p-1) = 21*p+11 for p >= 0. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jan 21 2013
maple: nmax:=68: for p from 0 to ceil(simplify(log[2](nmax))) do for n from 0 to ceil(nmax/(p+2))+1 do a((2*n+1)*2^p-1) := 21*p+11 od: od: seq(a(n), n=0..nmax); # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jan 21 2013
results.author: _Jonas Wallgren_, Jan 19 2001
